title: Steamed and Grilled Beets

ingredients.content: 1 blood orange, thin peel only, no pith (approx. 0.5 oz)
28 oz red beets, trimmed (approx. 12 md. beets)

preparations.content: Place peppercorns and allspice into mixing bowl and without measuring cup dry roast <b>6 min/250Â°F/speed 1.5<b>.
Add orange peel and zest <b>20 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add coffee and water. Place Varoma dish into position, weigh in beets, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>45 min/speed 1<b>.
Allow beets to cool 10 minutes. Rub beets with paper towel to remove beet skins. Cut into quarters and toss in canola oil.
Heat grill. Grill beets over high heat until charred (approx. 10 min.). Sprinkle sherry vinegar and olive oil over beets. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Can be refrigerated and served chilled.
